metadata.Title: CVE-2020-17510 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Apache Shiro before 1.7.0, when using Apache Shiro with Spring, a speciallycrafted HTTP request may cause an authentication bypass.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-17510` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libshiro-java - 1.3.2-4ubuntu0.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: shiro package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.2-4ubuntu0.2').
